Posts.Content: Mar 17, 2011 08:34AM karaoke1953 wrote: I am getting the last two treatments this week.  One today and the last one tomorrow.  I had to take a break for a few days because the skin under my arm totally broke down.  Just peeled right off to expose raw flesh under.  I have used everything Dr prescribed, still very tender.  I am so glad this is almost over.  Anyone else experience underarm skin breakdown?
